message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm confident it's worth a great deal. To start the conversation, I'm proposing a price of $18,000. What are your thoughts?

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate you countering.  I understand your perspective on the value; however, I'm confident in the product's worth and need to get closer to my initial asking price. How about we meet halfway between our two offers at $16,000?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $16,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original counteroffer, so how about $13,500?
